XEN Servers Now The budget division of Empire Hosting! Providing high class hosting solutions for over 17 years now.

Introduces Budget Class VPS servers Starting a as low as $2.50 per month
Totally UN-Managed VPS servers. If you need a helping hand once in a while these servers are not for you see Empire hosting https://www.empire-hosting.net/
